title: Endless December
description: "You're wrong. They're the ones who can't compete with you." The last time Kayleigh saw Holden Rivers, was in front of a rehabilitation center in May. To say things ended badly between them would be an understatement of epic proportions. Now, three months later, everyone is returning to school - including the anxiety ridden anorexic and her gorgeous ex-boyfriend. When the two have no choice but to come face to face again, will their romance reignite? Or will Kayleigh's issues stand in the way? Well, let's just say it's Holden's senior year and he's leaving nothing to chance.Endless December is the second book in a four book contemporary romance series. It continues to raise the stakes in love while still targeting real life issues. Continue the story of Kayleigh and Holden's whirlwind romance, and buy this book now.
author: Kelsey Clayton
